title: Scientists have identified a bone marrow backup system

title_detail.value: Scientists have identified a bone marrow backup system

summary: New research has identified a backup for an important biological system -- the hematopoietic system, whose adult stem cells constantly replenish the body's blood supply.

summary_detail.value: New research has identified a backup for an important biological system -- the hematopoietic system, whose adult stem cells constantly replenish the body's blood supply.
